profile.name: Marco Almeida
profile.tagline: Marco Almeida - WordPress and WooCommerce developer - Webdados and Naked Cat Plugins founder
profile.bio: My name is Marco Almeida and I'm a WordPress and WooCommerce developer. Founder of Webdados, a Portuguese company that specializes in WordPress development, and Naked Cat Plugins, which focuses on creating high-quality plugins for WordPress and WooCommerce. I'm passionate about open-source software and have contributed to various projects, including events, in the WordPress ecosystem.
